label: Entomology
subjectComment: Students interested in 100- to 400-level courses in the area of Entomology, including general education listings, should see the listings under http://www.life.uiuc.edu/sib/courses.htm. An Individual Plan of Study in LAS is available for students wishing to concentrate in Entomology. See http://www.las.uiuc.edu/students/programs/IPS/f_IPS.shtml.
collegeDepartmentDescription:
Head of Department: May R. Berenbaum
Department Office, 320 Morrill Hall, 505 South Goodwin, Urbana, 333-2910
Students interested in 100- to 400-level courses in the area of Entomology, including general education listings, should see the listings under http://www.life.uiuc.edu/sib/courses.htm. An Individual Plan of Study in LAS is available for students wishing to concentrate in Entomology. See http://www.las.uiuc.edu/students/programs/IPS/f_IPS.shtml. 
www.life.illinois.edu/entomology/
